segment.source: Preparing your Environment for MBAM 2.5
segment.target: Preparing your Environment for MBAM 2.5

segment.source: Preparing your Environment for MBAM 2.5
segment.target: Preparing your Environment for MBAM 2.5

segment.source: Preparing your Environment for MBAM 2.5
segment.target: Preparing your Environment for MBAM 2.5

segment.source: Before beginning Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Setup, you should make sure that you have met the prerequisites to install the product.
segment.target: Before beginning Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Setup, you should make sure that you have met the prerequisites to install the product.

segment.source: When you know what the prerequisites are ahead of time, you can efficiently deploy the product and enable its features so that it most effectively supports your organization’s business objectives.
segment.target: When you know what the prerequisites are ahead of time, you can efficiently deploy the product and enable its features so that it most effectively supports your organization’s business objectives.

segment.source: If you are deploying Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring with Configuration Manager, ensure that you meet the additional requirements for Configuration Manager, which are listed later in this topic.
segment.target: If you are deploying Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring with Configuration Manager, ensure that you meet the additional requirements for Configuration Manager, which are listed later in this topic.

segment.source: Review MBAM 2.5 deployment prerequisites
segment.target: Review MBAM 2.5 deployment prerequisites

segment.source: To ensure that your MBAM deployment is successful, make sure that you review and complete the required software prerequisites before you install the MBAM Client and configure the MBAM Server features.
segment.target: To ensure that your MBAM deployment is successful, make sure that you review and complete the required software prerequisites before you install the MBAM Client and configure the MBAM Server features.

segment.source: MBAM 2.5 Deployment Prerequisites
segment.target: MBAM 2.5 Deployment Prerequisites

segment.source: Plan for MBAM 2.5 Group Policy requirements
segment.target: Plan for MBAM 2.5 Group Policy requirements

segment.source: Before MBAM can manage clients in the enterprise, you must download and configure Group Policy templates that are specific to MBAM, and then configure the Group Policy settings that you want for your environment.
segment.target: Before MBAM can manage clients in the enterprise, you must download and configure Group Policy templates that are specific to MBAM, and then configure the Group Policy settings that you want for your environment.

segment.source: Planning for MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Requirements
segment.target: Planning for MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Requirements

segment.source: Plan for MBAM 2.5 roles and accounts
segment.target: Plan for MBAM 2.5 roles and accounts

segment.source: As part of the prerequisites, you must define certain roles and accounts, which are used in MBAM to provide security and access rights to specific servers and features, such as the databases running on SQL Server and the web applications running on the Administration and Monitoring Server.
segment.target: As part of the prerequisites, you must define certain roles and accounts, which are used in MBAM to provide security and access rights to specific servers and features, such as the databases running on SQL Server and the web applications running on the Administration and Monitoring Server.

segment.source: Planning for MBAM 2.5 Groups and Accounts
segment.target: Planning for MBAM 2.5 Groups and Accounts
